title: Yomiuri Giants pitcher Fukuda suspended for bets on baseball
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
A pitcher for the Yomiuri Giants, Japan's most popular baseball team, has been suspended for betting on games, including those involving his... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
